content.raw:
As for making them semi-transparent, Three.js is giving me a hard time... Some parts render on top of others, making it difficult to see the whole joint visual at once. 

I tried a couple of things, including setting the same material we have on [gzmanipulator](#!/osrf/gzweb/src/e8d0efa1396959784d9ff1752b130afedb5b4e4e/gz3d/src/gzmanipulator.js?at=default#cl-125) but it still gets occluded sometimes, I think it has to do with the order elements are added to the scene... Is it really important? :]
content.html:
As for making them semi-transparent, Three.js is giving me a hard time... Some parts render on top of others, making it difficult to see the whole joint visual at once.

I tried a couple of things, including setting the same material we have on gzmanipulator but it still gets occluded sometimes, I think it has to do with the order elements are added to the scene... Is it really important? :]
